snippet.title: Torque Drift - Steam Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Torque Drift for PC is now in Early Access on Steam!

Download now to receive an exclusive Early Access Pack, which includes the Torque Drift BRZ, Cash, Bullion, and a Limited Edition ‘Early Access’ Player Title.

Don’t miss the chance to be involved in the development of Torque Drift for the PC. We’ll be actively listening to your feedback as we develop and improve the game to make it the best it can be!

Coming soon:
- Steering Wheel Support
- Cross Platform Accounts
- Cross Platform Multiplayer
- HD graphics and new tracks
- Updated HD graphics for our cars and car interiors.
- Dynamic Weather Systems
- Driver Suits and decals
- Live lobbies
- Updates User interface
Plus much more!

Catch you on the track!
